com.compendium.core.datamodel
Interface IShortCutNodeSummary

All Superinterfaces:
ICoreConstants, IIdObject, INodeSummary, IPCObject, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ShortCutNodeSummary
public interface IShortCutNodeSummary
extends INodeSummary

The ShortCutNodeSummary object represents a short cut to a Node in the system. The short cut can be created or deleted, its reference cannot be reset. So this class does not broadcast or listen to any property changes.

Author:
rema and sajid
